en.description: Scan Lifeforms is a Mod that allows Oxylus to show Fishing Hotspots and apply Luminos Dye on nearby fish.

ru.description: Сканирование Форм Жизни — мод-заповедь для Стража Оксилус, который увеличивает число доступных миссий по поимке редких животных.

ko.description: Scan Lifeforms is a Mod that allows Oxylus to show Fishing Hotspots and apply Luminos Dye on nearby fish.

de.description: Scan Lifeforms is a Mod that allows Oxylus to show Fishing Hotspots and apply Luminos Dye on nearby fish.

fr.description: Scan Lifeforms is a Mod that allows Oxylus to show Fishing Hotspots and apply Luminos Dye on nearby fish.

pt.description: Scan Lifeforms is a Mod that allows Oxylus to show Fishing Hotspots and apply Luminos Dye on nearby fish.

zh-hans.description: 扫描水生生命体是奥克绪罗斯的一个指令MOD，它能让小地图上显示捕鱼热点并且让周围的鱼带有光亮染料的效果。

zh-hant.description: 掃描水生生命體是奧克緒羅斯的一個指令MOD，它能讓小地圖上顯示捕魚熱點並且讓周圍的魚帶有光亮染料的效果。

es.description: Escanea formas de vida acuáticas es un mod que le permite a Oxylus mostrar puntos de pesca y aplicar tinte luminoso en los peces cercanos.

it.description: Scan Lifeforms is a Mod that allows Oxylus to show Fishing Hotspots and apply Luminos Dye on nearby fish.
